mapper.insert: insert into cart(id, num, volume) values(#{id},#{num},#{volume})
mapper.select: select cs.*,p.imag from (select c.*,s.type,s.name,s.scale,s.color,s.price,s.ownernumber,s.comp,s.subname from (select * from cart where id=#{id}) c left join stock s on c.num = s.no) cs left join product p on cs.ownernumber = p.ownernumber
select count(*) from cart where num=#{num} and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update cart set volume=(select volume from cart where num=#{num})+#{volume} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where id=#{id}
select * from coupon where id=#{id} and (enddate >= sysdate)
